page.title: 02ATTITUDES
page.content: Many old peoples attitudes towards teenagers are reasonably good.They are quite polite to us & we are to them usually , but some think we are all drug takers & muggers.Reconstruction of the beach from Eastoke to Sandy Point has aroused many different attitudes, the majority of people living in that area are against it. A committee of trackers & residents has been formed to fight the local councils policy. The problem is the council promised a Sandy beach, what has happened is that all the stones are very large & jagged. The sand surrounding them looks like mud & has covered over all the golden sand. The Â£4\ million scheme is to stop severe erosion & winter flooding which has caused residents to complain for years.
